Fort_Wayne.Ninde-Mead-Farnsworth House: Ninde-Mead-Farnsworth House, also known as Iriscrest and the Philo T. Farnsworth House, is a historic home located at Fort Wayne, Indiana. It was built about 1910, and is a 1 1/2-story, side gabled, Colonial Revival style frame dwelling. It features a pedimented entrance portico.
